SEARCH
Package org.mazeApp.controller

Class MainControlleur

java.lang.Object
org.mazeApp.controller.MainControlleur
public class MainControlleur extends Object
Main controller for the maze application.

This class initializes and manages the core components of the application, including the graph, maze, and their respective views. It also sets up the algorithm and generation controllers, and handles UI container organization.

      Generates a new maze with the given dimensions and seed, and updates the model and view.
      Parameters:

      columns - the number of columns in the maze
      seed - the seed for random generation
